name: Blocky Fantasy Battle Simulator
description:
The kingdom is in danger!💀 The terrible dragon necromancer raised the hordes of skeletons, golems, ghosts and other horrible creatures to epic battle. You're not alone. You will be helped by various warriors.Hire troops and place them on the battlefield. As soon as the battle begins, they will fight for you!

FEATURES:
✅ Tactical battles.
✅ A lot of player units.
✅ Epic monsters.
✅ Upgrades. Fight and become stronger.
✅ Buy new armor, skins, weapons, shields and hats for the character.
✅ Upgrade your army.
✅ 30 levels of storyline
✅ Funny cubic characters.
✅Excellent blocky graphics.

Hurry, protect the kingdom of cubical people in Blocky Fantasy Battle Simulator!
